amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the United States civil courts system.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 925 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 925 proposed by Senator Tillis. (consideration: CR S1980; text: CR S1980) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the United States civil courts system.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 925 proposed by Senator Tillis.
